title: Don't you dare buy a foldable in 2025! Wait until the Galaxy Z Fold 8 is nigh, for big changes are underway
description: How do you like them big-battery, fast-charging apples?
content: But I'd say that it's best to wait until 2026 in order to get more for your dollar.Samsung may have put real effort into the Galaxy Z Fold 7's redesign, especially with that slimmer hinge and cleaner… [+3067 chars]
